# Government Notice: Standing Offer Solicitation
## Heavy Equipment Services for Correctional Service of Canada

### Notice Details

| **Notice Details** | **English** | **French** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **Notice Type** | Request for Standing Offer | Demande d’offre à commandes |
| **Notice Date** | January 25, 2023 | 25 janvier 2023 |
| **Notice Number** | 21207-24-4302450 | 21207-24-4302450 |
| **Publication Date** | January 25, 2023 | 25 janvier 2023 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | March 1, 2023 | 1er mars 2023 13:00:00 |

### Background
The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is seeking a standing offer for heavy equipment services to support various CSC institutions in Atlantic Canada. This standing offer is valid for a period of one year, with options for renewal for four additional one-year periods.

### Services Required
The contractor is expected to provide excavation, snow removal, and clearance services on an as-and-when-required basis to various CSC institutions in Atlantic Canada. The services will be provided from April 1, 2023, to March 31, 2024.

### Key Requirements

* The contractor must provide all necessary labour, equipment, and supplies to perform the work.
* The contractor must be located within 50km of the CSC institutions they will be servicing.
* The contractor must provide services in English.
* The contractor is responsible for transporting all necessary equipment, labour, and supplies to and from the work site.

### Trade Agreements
This standing offer is subject to various trade agreements, including the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organisation-Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), Canada Ukraine Free-Trade Agreement (CUFTA), and others.

### Evaluation Criteria
The standing offer will be evaluated based on the contractor's ability to meet the required services and their price competitiveness.

### Contact Information

### Additional Information
For more information, please refer to the solicitation document and associated documents available on Buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders.
